title: California says no to offshore oil drilling expansion
text:
California says no to offshore oil drilling expansion Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 02:04 
Environmental activists marched in California's capital to protest the Trump administration's plans to increase offshore drilling for oil and gas. Officials in the state are also vowing to use pipeline permits to block the process creating yet another showdown with Washington. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
